description: Roving Furnace description
name: Roving Furnace

description: Elya^F
name: Elya

description: A flying {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.SHIELD_UNIT.Hyperlink} that excels at increasing the {GLOBAL.UnitMoraleConcept.Hyperlink} of your units.
name: Exemplar

description: Grants access to an aggressive {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.SKIRMISHER.Hyperlink} that can inflict {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.CONDEMNED.Hyperlink} and {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.STUNNED.Hyperlink}.
name: Inquisitor

description: Cheap fanatical Fighter unit that is advantageous against {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.CONDEMNED.Hyperlink} units.
name: Zealot

description: A defensive structure that heals and buffs nearby friendly Undead units.
name: Necrotic Spire

description: A being from the void whose attacks cannot be blocked and that makes mortals go insane.
name: Living Fog

description: An elusive and fast shock unit, capable of teleportation.
name: Phase Beast

description: Stationary tower that shoots enemies and amplifies spell damage.
name: Amplification Pylon

description: A {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.BATTLE_MAGE.Hyperlink} with offensive chain lightning magic.
name: Evoker

description: Slow but strong siege engine capable of destroying whole sections of walls within moments.
name: Earthshatter Engine

description: Only obeying the command of the absolute masters of the earth, the Earth Titan is an unstoppable force and the embodiment of the earth's rage.
name: Earth Titan

description: A {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.BATTLE_MAGE.Hyperlink} that shifts armor from enemies to allies and petrifies enemies.
name: Transmuter

description: Summon a {GLOBAL.UNITS.WIND_RAGER_UNIT.Hyperlink}, a fast and disruptive {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.FIGHTER.Hyperlink}
name: Wind Rager

description: A stationary plant that entangles anything that comes within its range.
name: Living Vine

description: Close-range Battle Mage unit that excels at exploiting negative status effects.
name: Chaos Eater

description: This amalgamation of reanimated corpses has the sole purpose of killing your foes, with no regard for its own survival.
name: Bone Horror

description: Grants access to a {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.BATTLE_MAGE.Hyperlink} that inflicts {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.FROZEN.Hyperlink}.
name: White Witch

description: A heavy {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.SHOCK_UNIT.Hyperlink} that specializes in lowering {GLOBAL.UnitMoraleConcept.Hyperlink}.
name: Tyrant Knight

description: A {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.SUPPORT_UNIT.Hyperlink} that empowers your \<\<m:{GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.ANIMAL.Hyperlink}\>\> and affects hostile \<\<m:{GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.ANIMAL.Hyperlink}\>\>.
name: Wildspeaker

description: An immobile siege engine that can hurl large projectiles over large distances. But may be inaccurate.
name: Trebuchet

description: Expandable {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.FIGHTER.Hyperlink} that is immune to Status Effects.
name: Iron Golem Assistant

description: Highly defensive {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.SHIELD_UNIT.Hyperlink} that is resistant to negative status effects and protects allies from them.
name: Iron Golem

description: A powerful warden of nature and the personification of its wrath. Capable of summoning and healing.
name: Horned God

description: A {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.BATTLE_MAGE.Hyperlink} that spreads fire and inflicts {GLOBAL.PROPERTIES.BURNING.Hyperlink}.
name: Pyromancer

description: An mobile siege engine that can hurl projectiles over large distances. But may be inaccurate.
name: Onager
